author: timbeiko
content:
**Sepolia & Holesky Dencun Announcement**

Blobs are coming to both testnets, with Sepolia forking on Jan 30 and Holesky on Feb 7th .oO

If you run a node on either network, now is the time to update. Client releases in the announcement are valid for both of these. Once things are stable on both testnets, expect an announcement for mainnet ðŸ˜„ 

https://blog.ethereum.org/2024/01/24/sepolia-holesky-dencun
